root.Summary: 1: Zhao Y, Xue F, Sun J, Guo S, Zhang H, Qiu B, Geng J, Gu J, Zhou X, Wang W,Zhang Z, Tang N, He Y, Yu J, Xia Q. Genome-wide methylation profiling of thedifferent stages of hepatitis B virus-related hepatocellular carcinomadevelopment in plasma cell-free DNA reveals potential biomarkers for earlydetection and high-risk monitoring of hepatocellular carcinoma. Clin Epigenetics.2014 Dec 2;6(1):30. doi: 10.1186/1868-7083-6-30. eCollection 2014. PubMed PMID:25859288; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4391300.
